|brand = Amped Wireless |model = RTA1300M |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC1300 |series = (Artemis) |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = ZTT-RTA1300M |icid = 10233A-RTA1300M |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm;IPQ4018; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A7 |cpu1spd = 638<!-- 710 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = Serial(SPI) |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;; |fla1chipmodelfull = <!-- Flash1 full chip info --> |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CC64M16GP-DI; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8075; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = <!-- 10MbE,100MbE,1GbE, --> |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = F8:7B:8C |oui = F8:7B:8C
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wave2, MU-MIMO |addchip = 2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SKY2623L;SKY, 2623L, 526CX;2; ,,, 2.4GHz SPDT Switch with Low-Noise Amplifier;Skyworks;SKY85201-11;SKY1, 5201, 520B;2; ,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SKY85728-11;SKY85728-11, UM5KR, 1514, MY;2; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.3.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = Amped_Artemis_2.4, Amped_Artemis_5.0 |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Edimax |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = LEDE Project
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 05/03/2016 |estreldate = 05/31/2016 |estprice = 129.99 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B01GE9RC6K |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = 400 |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1cpu = true |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 867 |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 750, 900, 1000 --> |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "1244-01001083-50Z_ES" is silkscreened on the board. {{see also|Edimax|}}
FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/ZTT-RTA1300M ZTT-RTA1300M] (2016-05-03) :Default settings are per the [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=2977320 FCC label].
<small> *'''High Power Quad-Core Processor''': :A quad-core processor handles heavy traffic with ease, for the best Wi-Fi experience *'''Ultra-Fast AC1300 Speeds''': :Get more done with AC1300 Wi-Fi speeds up to 400Mbps 2.4GHz + 866Mbps 5GHz *'''Multi-User MIMO''': :Deliver data to multiple devices at once for a boost in performance and speed *'''8 Powerful Amplifiers & 2 Antennas''': :Amplify Wi-Fi to the max with advanced amplifiers and external antennas *'''Extreme Wi-Fi Range''': :High Power Wi-Fi for whole home or whole office coverage *'''Advanced Security Features''': :Adjust the coverage of your network, block websites and utilize SPI Firewall *'''Guest Networks & User Access''': :Create up to 8 networks for guests and restrict access to specific users *'''Ultimate Gaming, HD & 4K''': :Seamlessly stream HD and 4K content to multiple devices and eliminate gaming lag *'''Bandwidth Optimization''': :Prioritize bandwidth for specific applications, networks and devices on your network *'''Share Files with USB''': :Attach a USB drive and instantly share files at blazing-fast speeds, locally or remotely </small>
===Specifications=== * Product class: ''AC1300'' (400Mbps [2.4 GHz] + 867Mbps [5 GHz]) * Processor: [[Qualcomm]] IPQ4018 Quad-Core ARM Processor * Memory: 128MB DDR3 * Amplifiers: 4x Low Noise Amplifiers, :2x 2.4GHz Power Amplifiers, 2x 5GHz Power Amplifiers * Antennas: 2x Detachable Dual Band High Gain 5dBi * Ports: 1x GbE WAN, 4x GbE LAN, 1x ''USB 3.0'' * Power Supply: AC Input: 110~240V (50~60Hz) : DC Output: 12V with max. 2A current
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[http://www.tweaktown.com/reviews/7812/amped-wireless-artemis-ac1300-rta1300m-router-review/index.html ''Amped Wireless Artemis RTA1300M Wireless Router'' on '''TweakTown'''] *[http://techaeris.com/2016/06/28/amped-wireless-artemis-high-power-ac1300-wi-fi-router-review/ ''ARTEMIS High Power AC1300 Wi-Fi Router'' on '''TechAeris''']
===Forum threads=== *[http://www.snbforums.com/threads/amped-wireless-shipping-2x2-mu-mimo-router.32734/ ''Amped Wireless Shipping 2x2 MU-MIMO Router'' on '''SNBforums'''] *[http://www.snbforums.com/threads/qualcomm-rolls-out-its-tri-radio-ac-platform.32865 ''Qualcomm Rolls Out Its Tri-radio AC Platform'' on '''SNBforums'''] *[https://github.com/chunkeey/LEDE-IPQ40XX ''LEDE/Openwrt for IPQ4019/IPQ4028 devices'' on '''chunkeey''']
==See also== *[[Amped Wireless RTA15]] - ''High Power AC1200 Dual Band Wi-Fi Router'' *[[Amped Wireless RTA1300M]] - ''ARTEMIS High Power AC1300 Dual Band Wi-Fi Router'' *[[Amped Wireless RE1300M]] - ''ARTEMIS-EX High Power AC1300 Wi-Fi Range Extender'' *[[Amped Wireless RTA1900]] - ''TITAN High Power AC1900 Wi-Fi Router'' *[[Amped Wireless RE1900A]] - ''TITAN-EX High Power AC1900 Wi-Fi Range Extender *[[Amped Wireless RTA2600]] - ''ATHENA High Power AC2600 Wi-Fi Router'' *[[Amped Wireless RE2600M]] - ''ATHENA-EX High Power AC2600 Wi-Fi Range Extender''
